comments.body: @holdenk @sunchao @viirya, added this comment to clarify the behavior change as discussed.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +67,71 @@ * {@link Table#capabilities()}. *

* If the scan supports runtime filtering and implements {@link SupportsRuntimeFiltering}, * this method may be called multiple times. Therefore, implementations can cache some state * to avoid planning the job twice.
